title: 求JJ怪MOD
txt_content:
求JJ怪MOD
就是变成JJ怪的那个。1.5或1.6的都行

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
先安裝 ModLoader
刪除 META-INF
把MOD壓縮檔內文件全照搬入minecraft.jar

1.5跟1.5_01差不多啦~~

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
才一分 唉

[attach]5736[/attach]

下载吧 1.501的 作者没更新到166。。。 安装不用我说了

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html

replies.txt_content:
